programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Invincible - Inbee Park - EP18

programme.title: Invincible - US Women Football - EP47

programme.title: Invincible - Lionel Messi - EP21

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.desc: T'Pau's Carol Decker with 30 years of the most amazing women who ROCK! From Grace Slick in the 60s to Florence Welch in the 00s - these ladies all left an incredible mark.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: Paris La Blanche
programme.desc: In this parable of migration, Rekia, 70 years-old, leaves Kabylie for Paris to fetch her husband, Nour, back home. Nour has been sustaining the family from abroad for 40 years. Finding help in new friends, she finds Nour but he is a changed man.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Young Tiger
programme.desc: Illegally smuggled into France to work, 15-year-old Many is unexpectedly placed in school and a foster home. Years later, thriving in the French Sikh community, Many faces a moral dilemma arising from his ties to his family in his home country.

programme.title: The Audition
programme.desc: Violin teacher Anna Bronsky detects remarkable talent in a student, Alexander. Anna becomes obsessed with mentoring him, neglecting her family and spiralling under mounting pressure. As her fixation overtakes her, all is staked on exam day.

programme.title: The Valley
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash in the middle of Lebanon’s isolated Beqaa Valley, an amnesiac man finds himself held hostage on a local farm that doubles as an illegal drug-production facility.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Jealousy
programme.desc: Inspector Bruhl is investigating the abduction of a young boy from a playground, until evidence suggests that the boy doesn’t exist at all. Is he a figment of the alleged mother’s fractured reality, or are answers buried in her traumatic past?

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows The Detective And The Fear
programme.desc: When Inspector Martin Brühl awakens in the morning, he is alarmed by partner Susanne Koch’s absence. Unbeknownst to him, Susanne witnessed a crime on her nightly walk home. Critically injured in an ATM explosion, she was kidnapped by the perpetrators.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.

programme.title: Milk Teeth
programme.desc: Living in a small rural community, Skalde navigates societal stigma due to having an “outsider” mother. When she befriends a mysterious girl in the woods, Skalde jeopardizes everything, struggling to balance loyalty to her community and her newfound bond.

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they’ll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.
